alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Curry County; Estancia Valley; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Roosevelt County; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 22 at 1:02PM MDT until March 22 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, West Central Highlands, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Lower Rio Grande Valley, Estancia Valley, Curry County, Roosevelt County, Chaves County Plains, and San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Curry County; Estancia Valley; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Roosevelt County; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; West Central Highlands
